      • GetConvertDocumentToImage

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @GET(value="html/{name}/convert/image/{outFormat}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetConvertDocumentToImage(@Path(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="outFormat")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String outFormat,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="width")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer width,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="height")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer height,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="leftMargin")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer leftMargin,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="rightMargin")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer rightMargin,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="topMargin")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer topMargin,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="bottomMargin")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer bottomMargin,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="xResolution")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer xResolution,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="yResolution")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer yResolution,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="folder")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String folder,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="storage")
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String storage)
        Convert the HTML document from the storage by its name to the specified image format.
        Parameters:
        name - Document name. (required)
        outFormat - Resulting image format. (required)
        width - Resulting image width. (optional)
        height - Resulting image height. (optional)
        leftMargin - Left resulting image margin. (optional)
        rightMargin - Right resulting image margin. (optional)
        topMargin - Top resulting image margin. (optional)
        bottomMargin - Bottom resulting image margin. (optional)
        xResolution - Horizontal resolution of resulting image. (optional)
        yResolution - Vertical resolution of resulting image. (optional)
        folder - The source document folder. (optional)
        storage - The source document storage. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<File>
